load_data

load_data.py - Load Grad Cafe data into PostgreSQL database.

This script loads the LLM-extended applicant data into a PostgreSQL database for analysis. Uses DATABASE_URL environment variable when set. Idempotent: duplicate URLs are skipped via ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING.

src.load_data.create_table(cur)[source]

Create the applicants table if it doesn’t exist. url has UNIQUE for idempotency.

src.load_data.extract_program(program_str)[source]

Extract program name from program string like ‘Computer Science, MIT’.

src.load_data.extract_university(program_str)[source]

Extract university name from program string like ‘Computer Science, MIT’.

src.load_data.get_connection()[source]

Get DB connection using DATABASE_URL or fallback env vars.

src.load_data.get_is_american(us_int_str)[source]

Convert US/International field to is_american text.

src.load_data.load_data(cur, data)[source]

Load data into the applicants table. Skips duplicates by url (idempotent).

src.load_data.main()[source]

Main function to load data into PostgreSQL.

src.load_data.parse_date(date_str)[source]

Parse date string to datetime object.

src.load_data.parse_decision(status_str)[source]

Extract decision type from status string like ‘Accepted on 29 Jan’.

src.load_data.parse_decision_date(status_str, term_str)[source]

Extract decision date from status string.

src.load_data.parse_float(value_str, prefix='')[source]

Extract float value from string like ‘GPA 3.9’ or ‘GRE V 159’.
